Monster.Name: Giant Sea Horse
Monster.Description: Like their smaller kin, giant sea horses are shy, colorful fish with elongated bodies and curled tails. Aquatic elves train them as mounts.

MonsterTrait.Name: Charge
MonsterTrait.Text: If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. It the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Breathing
MonsterTrait.Text: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

MonsterAction.Name: Ram
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
